mapper.sql: id, delegate_person, car_brand, car_model, consumer_name, mortgage_commissioner, mortgage_company, loan_fee, interest_rate, mortgage_rebate, back_fee, assessment_fee, risk_fee, renewal_fee, pad_fee, door_fee, stamp_duty, other_fee, expense_is_company, expense_fee, expense_rebate, money_back_consumer, is_mortgage, mortgage_date, mortgage_money, a_mortgage_money, is_sale, sale_id, is_new_car, new_car_id, display_status, ctime, utime
mapper.select: select auto_increment from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA='cm' and TABLE_NAME='cm_mortgage_record'
mapper.insert: insert into cm_mortgage_record (id, delegate_person, car_brand, car_model, consumer_name, mortgage_commissioner, mortgage_company, loan_fee, interest_rate, mortgage_rebate, back_fee, assessment_fee, risk_fee, renewal_fee, pad_fee, door_fee, stamp_duty, other_fee, expense_is_company, expense_fee, expense_rebate, money_back_consumer, is_mortgage, mortgage_date, mortgage_money, a_mortgage_money, is_sale, sale_id, is_new_car, new_car_id, display_status, ctime, utime) values (#{id},#{delegatePerson},#{carBrand},#{carModel},#{consumerName},#{mortgageCommissioner},#{mortgageCompany},#{loanFee},#{interestRate}, #{mortgageRebate},#{backFee},#{assessmentFee},#{riskFee},#{renewalFee},#{padFee},#{doorFee},#{stampDuty},#{otherFee},#{expenseIsCompany}, #{expenseFee},#{expenseRebate},#{moneyBackConsumer},#{isMortgage},#{mortgageDate},#{mortgageMoney},#{aMortgageMoney},#{isSale},#{saleId},#{isNewCar},#{newCarId},#{displayStatus},#{ctime},#{utime})
mapper.update:
update cm_mortgage_record
delegate_person = #{delegatePerson},
car_brand = #{carBrand},
car_model = #{carModel},
consumer_name = #{consumerName},
mortgage_commissioner = #{mortgageCommissioner},
mortgage_company = #{mortgageCompany},
loan_fee = #{loanFee},
interest_rate = #{interestRate},
mortgage_rebate = #{mortgageRebate},
back_fee = #{backFee},
assessment_fee = #{assessmentFee},
risk_fee = #{riskFee},
renewal_fee = #{renewalFee},
pad_fee = #{padFee},
door_fee = #{doorFee},
stamp_duty = #{stampDuty},
other_fee = #{otherFee},
expense_is_company = #{expenseIsCompany},
expense_fee = #{expenseFee},
expense_rebate = #{expenseRebate},
money_back_consumer = #{moneyBackConsumer},
is_mortgage = #{isMortgage},
mortgage_date = #{mortgageDate},
mortgage_money = #{mortgageMoney},
a_mortgage_money = #{aMortgageMoney},
is_sale = #{isSale},
sale_id = #{saleId},
is_new_car = #{isNewCar},
new_car_id = #{newCarId},
display_status = #{displayStatus},
utime = #{utime},
where id = #{id}
